sentences.en: Bulky clothes tend to hinder movement.
sentences.cn: 肥大的衣服常常碍手碍脚.

sentences.en: Bulky items will be collected separately.
Furniture is so bulky, it takes so much room.
sentences.cn: 家具体积太大，占了太多空间。

sentences.en: He let out a cry that convulsed his bulky frame and jerked his arm.
sentences.cn: 他大叫一声，高大的身躯剧烈地抖了一下，手臂也突然一哆嗦。

sentences.en: He struggled out of his bulky jacket and threw it on to the back seat.
sentences.cn: 他费劲脱下他那件笨重的夹克，随手把它扔在后座上。

sentences.en: He was tall and bulky, but he walked with a slouching gait.
sentences.cn: 他身材高大, 但是走起路来却是无精打采的样子.

sentences.en: Her padded coat made her look very bulky.
sentences.cn: 穿着棉袄使她显得臃肿.

sentences.en: It was bulky, perhaps three feet long and almost as high.
sentences.cn: 它体积很大，大约有3英尺长，高度也将近3英尺。

sentences.en: Lookouts and leadsmen in bulky life jackets stumbled and slipped after him.
sentences.cn: 监视哨和测深员穿着饱鼓鼓的救生衣,跌跌撞撞地跟在他后面.

sentences.en: On the other side of the sofa sat the bulky Clemenza.
sentences.cn: 长沙发的另一端坐着大胖子克莱门扎.

sentences.en: Some aircraft are designed to carry bulky freight or vehicles.
sentences.cn: 有些飞机设计得能运载体积大的货物或车辆.

sentences.en: Such materials are bulky and expensive both to transport and to apply.
sentences.cn: 这种物质既数量大,又在运输和应用上费用昂贵.

sentences.en: The climber took some food from the bulky pack on his back.
sentences.cn: 登山者从背后大包裹里拿出一些食物.

sentences.en: The elaborate character of the frame had made the picture extremely bulky.
sentences.cn: 精工制作的镜框使画显得挺累赘.

sentences.en: The trees in the Embankment garden stood bulky against the incandescent Sky - line.
sentences.cn: 河堤花园里的树木背衬着灯光燃炽的夜空巍巍屹立.

words.tran_cn: 体积，容量；大多数，大部分；大块
使扩大，使形成大量；使显得重要
体积大的；庞大的；笨重的

phrases.tran_cn: 轻泡货；超大货物；笨重货物

trans.tran_cn: 庞大的，笨重的，高大肥胖的
trans.tran_en: something that is bulky is bigger than other things of its type, and is difficult to carry or store
